# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and quality that truly stand out in its category. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to purchase it for $95. This price reflects its high-quality standards and the value it brings to you. I hope we can reach an agreement that is beneficial for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
